select STU.id, STU.`name`, class_id, major_id, gra_score AS graCredit, SUM(CS.credit) AS curCredit from stu_info AS STU, sys_user AS SYS, major_info AS M, course_info AS CS, choose_course AS CH
mapper.select: WHERE STU.id = SYS.user_id AND SYS.`status` = 0 AND SYS.del_flag = '0' AND STU.id = #{id} AND STU.major_id = M.id AND CH.stu_id = STU.id AND CH.pass = 1 AND CH.course_id = CS.id GROUP BY STU.id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stu_info(id, name, type, adm_method,in_school, stu_status, class_id, major_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{type},#{admMethod}, #{inSchool}, #{stuStatus}, #{classId}, #{majorId});
